class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        d = Counter()
        n = len(nums)
        lst = []
        for i in range(n//2):
            d[abs(nums[i]-nums[n-i-1])] += 1
            lst.append(max(k-nums[i],nums[i],nums[n-i-1],k-nums[n-i-1]))
        m = len(lst)
        lst.sort()
        ans = inf
        for key,v in d.items():
            x = bisect_left(lst,key)
            ans = min(ans, x*2+m-x-v)
        return ans
